body:
This is my new skin. I might be hard to see but the skin is utilizing the double layers.

For those of you who know me from earlier, this was my adventurer skin that I have remade using a robotic arm template I found online.


Anyways, I wanted to know if people liked it, or if you wanted the link to the Robot Arm so you can add it to your own.

Thanks!
~higger

P.S. Resistance is Futile! You will be assimilated!

EDIT: I have no Idea why my face isnt showing up in Avicus...

title: New Skin! In Honor of 1.8
